CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 22, 1955, pg. 28, reads: "The Cast of 'I Am a Camera,' first production of the season of the Irene Kaufmann Curtaineers, is pictured between acts on the stage after their opening performance last Wednesday night. Left to right: Janet Shafer, Martin Croop, Bebalyn Raines, James Hughs, Earl Monte and Alfreda Barrow.  Miss Raines and Mr. Croop starred in production which ran the last three nights of last week. - 'Teenie' Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Actors Janet Shafer, Martin Croop, Bebalyn Raines, James Hughs, Earl Monte, and Alfreda Barrow posed on stage for production of "I Am A Camera," in Irene Kaufmann auditorium
